participant_1.name: Emma Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Emma has a keen interest in finance and a strong desire to succeed in the business world.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and adventurous, Jake enjoys the thrill of skateboarding and has a carefree attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: i'm a skateboarder. i am always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. my friends are all skateboarders.
